document.full_text: retailers tracked by thomson reuters posted an unexpected 1.7 percent increase in march, handily beating the average analyst estimate of a 0.7 percent decline.
document.title: u.s. retailers report a surprising rise in march sales
lines_and_colors: retailers tracked by thomson reuters posted an unexpected 1.7 percent increase in march, handily beating the average analyst estimate of a 0.7 percent decline.
